turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza sounds good right now. sure, let me start the order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking one chicken bacon ranch, one supreme pizza, and a pepperoni with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin crust for all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. let me read that back to you. you said you wanted 3 small pizzas with thin crust, 1 with bbq chicken ranch, 1 pepperoni with extra cheese, and 1 supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chicken bacon ranch, but otherwise, yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry let me fix that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small pizzas with thin crust, 1 with chicken bacon ranch, 1 pepperoni with extra cheese, and 1 supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $34.02 should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for you to pick it up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. good bye.
